CIRCULAR 2005 (CIRCULAR) 
FAX-23315695 / 23311598 
NO.CAS-8(1)/2004.DIV-1 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
A WING , JANPATH  BHAWAN , 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI -110001 
Date: 28.1.2005 
 
C I R C U L A R  NO. 03 / 2005 
 
 
Sub:- 
Access  of   vehicle  of Shri Shivraj Patil, Hon’ble Home Minister of Union of 
India upto  the tarmac of the civil airports in the country on security ground. 
 
In continuation to   this  Bureau  Circular  No. 24/2002  dated 06.09.2002, 
access of vehicle of Shri Shivraj Patil, Hon’ble Home Minister of Union of India  is  
permitted upto tarmac area at all airports in the country during arrivals/ departures on 
security grounds till further orders. 
 
 
(R.C. Tayal) 
Offg. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
Distribution as  per list attached.
